alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:01PM EST until further notice by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following counties, Monroe and Noble. * WHEN...Until 200 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 701 PM EST, Doppler radar showed the rain slowly tapering off. However, runoff continues, and local streams are still rising. Flooding is ongoing in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dudley, Dexter City, Stafford and Harriettsville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
